start.description: You are in a dark room. A book is in front of you.

book_opened.description: You open the book. The pages are filled with strange symbols.

room_left.description: You leave the room and find yourself in a hallway.

hallway.description: The hallway is long and dark. You feel a strange presence.

next_scene.description: This is the next part of the story.

end.description: Congratulations, you've reached the end of the demo!
